text: "Nutshell" is a 1994 song by Alice in Chains. It was taken from their extended play Jar of Flies. It was played on MTV Unplugged in 1996. The live version went on to be featured on 1999 album Music Bank and 2006 album The Essential Alice in Chains. ==References== Category:1994 songs Category:Alice in Chains songs Category:Acoustic rock songs Category:Alternative rock songs
title: Nutshell (song)
